# Module: tf.saved_model.utils



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/saved_model/utils.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/saved_model/utils.py).

SavedModel utility functions.

Utility functions to assist with setup and construction of the SavedModel proto.

## Functions

[`build_tensor_info(...)`](../../tf/saved_model/utils/build_tensor_info): Utility function to build TensorInfo proto.

[`get_tensor_from_tensor_info(...)`](../../tf/saved_model/utils/get_tensor_from_tensor_info): Returns the Tensor or SparseTensor described by a TensorInfo proto.
